ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:09:29 [Issue ID 4000-612075] urn:comicvine:4000-612075 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 12:16:18. [Issue ID 1734992]
ComicInfo.Summary:
New Orleans has long been synonymous with voodoo and black magic. Ghosts are often seen haunting the graveyards and streets without doing anyone harm but now for some reason they’ve turned deadly. The Spirit Hunter’s team has been called in to find out why and they soon learn that the dead of spirit realm are most dangerous when they are controlled by the living.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jose Luis & Ulises Grostieta | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Ula Mos | 2 | C | Cover C | Noah Salonga & Ceci de la Cruz | 3 | D | Cover D | Sheldon Goh & Mohan Sivakami | 4 | E | Boston Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Mike DeBalfo (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | F | Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Mike Krome (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | G | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 150 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | H | In-Store Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | Note: The digital edition (8/2/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
